answers.question: Partner types
answers.answer: cloud platform partners, technology partners, resource (services) partners

answers.question: Top GSIs/SIs in France
answers.answer: HCLTech

answers.question: France-specific notes
answers.answer: In France, Aiven’s presence is still growing; it works with local cloud providers like OVHcloud (an OEM partner) to deliver managed open-source databases in compliance with local regulations[5]. French customers also benefit from Aiven’s European support and its partners’ expertise in GDPR-compliant cloud migrations and data architecture (Aiven established a Paris office, Aiven France SAS, in 2022).

answers.question: Common services
answers.answer: consulting, implementation, managed services, migration, data architecture, strategy

answers.question: French specialists
answers.answer: OVHcloud

answers.question: Top GSIs/SIs in France
answers.answer: Accenture, Deloitte, EY, PwC, Capgemini, Infosys, EPAM, BearingPoint, Devoteam, Business & Decision

answers.question: France-specific notes
answers.answer: Collibra’s Silver-tier partners include Capgemini (a French-headquartered global SI) and PwC, among others, who bring deep industry knowledge in deploying Collibra at scale[10][11]. There is also a rich ecosystem of specialized integrators: for instance, Ishango by Lamarck Group is highlighted as a “strategic French partner” focused on accelerating Collibra adoption in France[12].

answers.question: Common services
answers.answer: consulting, implementation, strategy

answers.question: Program highlights
answers.answer: For example, Accenture and Deloitte are Collibra Gold partners, providing strategy and implementation services for Collibra’s data governance platform[7][8].

answers.question: French specialists
answers.answer: Devoteam, Business & Decision, Lamarck Group, Ishango

answers.question: Partner types
answers.answer: consulting partners

answers.question: Top GSIs/SIs in France
answers.answer: Accenture, Deloitte, EY, KPMG, Capgemini, Atos, Tata Consultancy Services, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), Worldline

answers.question: France-specific notes
answers.answer: In France, Confluent’s integrator ecosystem includes both the French branches of those global GSIs and local specialists. French enterprises commonly engage firms like Capgemini or Atos (which have Kafka experts) for Confluent implementations – though Confluent’s official references emphasize global partners rather than country-specific ones.

answers.question: Common services
answers.answer: consulting, implementation, migration, data architecture, training, co-selling

answers.question: Program highlights
answers.answer: For example, Accenture has a dedicated Confluent practice and was recognized for co-selling services that accelerate customers’ “Data in Motion” use cases[20].

answers.question: Top GSIs/SIs in France
answers.answer: EY, IBM

answers.question: France-specific notes
answers.answer: In terms of France, Converge TS’s footprint is currently limited. This indicates a growing European presence, but no major French acquisition or office has been announced to date.

answers.question: Common services
answers.answer: implementation, managed services, integration

answers.question: Top GSIs/SIs in France
answers.answer: EY, Sopra Steria, CGI, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), Wipro, Orange Business

answers.question: France-specific notes
answers.answer: In France, F5’s ecosystem features both local specialists and the regional arms of global firms. For example, Nomios France (formerly Infradata) is a prominent F5 integration partner – Nomios is an award-winning F5 Gold Partner in Europe with certified experts in F5’s BIG-IP technologies[30].

answers.question: Common services
answers.answer: consulting, managed services, integration

answers.question: Program highlights
answers.answer: Global Systems Integrators (GSIs) play a role through F5’s Unity+ Partner Program, which includes a dedicated Global Systems Integrators Program[26].

answers.question: French specialists
answers.answer: Sopra Steria, Orange Business

answers.question: Top GSIs/SIs in France
answers.answer: Deloitte, EY

answers.question: France-specific notes
answers.answer: These partners often specialize in fleet solutions and IT integration – for example, in France, Arkeup GIS is a distributor-integrator of Geotab’s telematics, offering local support for French fleet customers[40]. Arkeup GIS (based in Paris) provides services such as installing Geotab’s GO devices, customizing Geotab’s software via APIs, and integrating Geotab data with clients’ internal systems[41][40].

answers.question: Common services
answers.answer: consulting, integration

answers.question: Top GSIs/SIs in France
answers.answer: EY

answers.question: France-specific notes
answers.answer: In France, Grafana Labs’ partner ecosystem would include local IT providers that specialize in monitoring and APM. While Grafana’s official releases didn’t list French firms by name, there are Paris-based partners listed in directories (e.g., monitoring specialists like BeeVirtua or Omegapoint have offered Grafana services in French market per community info).

answers.question: Common services
answers.answer: consulting, training, co-selling, integration

answers.question: Program highlights
answers.answer: By mid-2022, Grafana Labs had signed over 80 global channel partners, with a majority in EMEA and North America, as part of its partner program[43][44].

answers.question: Top GSIs/SIs in France
answers.answer: Accenture, Deloitte, EY, KPMG, IBM, Capgemini, Atos, Eviden, Infosys, Wipro, HCLTech

answers.question: France-specific notes
answers.answer: In France, NVIDIA’s collaborations with SIs align with Europe’s push for AI. For instance, Capgemini (France’s largest IT firm) is a key NVIDIA ally – Capgemini and NVIDIA announced joint efforts to build AI “factories” and sovereign cloud AI solutions in Europe[63][53].

answers.question: Common services
answers.answer: consulting, managed services, training, strategy

answers.question: Program highlights
answers.answer: This allows customers to tap specialized expertise and “turnkey” AI services powered by NVIDIA, whether via Accenture’s global AI practice or Capgemini’s local engineering teams[55][58].

answers.question: Partner types
answers.answer: technology partners, consulting partners

answers.question: Top GSIs/SIs in France
answers.answer: Sopra Steria, Infosys

answers.question: France-specific notes
answers.answer: In France, Redis is used by a number of enterprises (e.g., in e-commerce and financial services for low-latency data needs). Redis Labs’ partner page is available in French, and some local French IT firms have likely joined as Redis resellers/integrators.

answers.question: Common services
answers.answer: consulting, training

answers.question: Program highlights
answers.answer: Redis, known for its real-time in-memory database platform, has built an enhanced global partner program that includes system integrators, VARs, and distributors to expand enterprise adoption of Redis Enterprise[67][68].

answers.question: French specialists
answers.answer: Sopra Steria

answers.question: Top GSIs/SIs in France
answers.answer: Accenture, Deloitte, EY, KPMG, Capgemini, Atos, Orange Business

answers.question: France-specific notes
answers.answer: In France, Splunk’s integrator ecosystem is well-developed and includes both French IT services firms and local branches of global SIs. Notably, Orange Business Services (through its Orange Cyberdefense unit) is an Elite Splunk Partner in France[75][76].

answers.question: Common services
answers.answer: consulting, implementation, managed services, integration

answers.question: Program highlights
answers.answer: Accenture and Splunk have a longstanding alliance – Accenture even built a dedicated Splunk practice (Accenture’s Splunk-certified experts help clients with IT monitoring and security analytics using Splunk’s platform).

answers.question: French specialists
answers.answer: Orange Business

answers.question: Top GSIs/SIs in France
answers.answer: Accenture, Deloitte, EY, IBM, Kyndryl, Capgemini, Atos, Sopra Steria, Wipro, Worldline

answers.question: France-specific notes
answers.answer: In France, Teradata’s solutions have historically been implemented by the French arms of these global SIs. For example, Capgemini France has been involved in Teradata projects for banking and retail clients (Capgemini helped a major French retailer build a Teradata-based customer data hub in a past case).

answers.question: Common services
answers.answer: consulting, implementation, migration, strategy, integration

answers.question: Program highlights
answers.answer: Also, Accenture France has a strong Analytics practice and can execute Teradata cloud migrations for French companies (the global Accenture–Teradata partnership includes Europe).

answers.question: French specialists
answers.answer: Sopra Steria

answers.question: Partner types
answers.answer: technology partners, resource (services) partners

answers.question: Top GSIs/SIs in France
answers.answer: Accenture, Deloitte, EY, KPMG, IBM, Kyndryl, NTT Data, Capgemini, Atos, Sopra Steria, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), Infosys, Wipro, HCLTech, Devoteam, Orange Business, Inetum

answers.question: France-specific notes
answers.answer: In France, many of these same GSIs are delivering Zscaler projects. Capgemini France has worked on several cloud security transformations where Zscaler is the chosen platform (Capgemini is listed as a leading strategic partner leveraging Zscaler globally[104]).

answers.question: Common services
answers.answer: consulting, managed services, training, strategy, integration

answers.question: Program highlights
answers.answer: Through such partnerships, a customer might engage, say, EY to design a zero-trust network architecture, which involves implementing Zscaler proxies and agents for all users – EY would handle the technical rollout and change management, leveraging its partnership with Zscaler for best practices and support[102][103].

answers.question: French specialists
answers.answer: Devoteam, Sopra Steria, Orange Business, Inetum
